Name: Pang Adventures
About the game: The Pang series is a beloved collection of arcade video games from the early 90s. Guide two brothers on a quest around the world to save humankind from a massive alien invasion! For the first time in the series, the Pang Brothers come face-to-face with the nefarious Alien Commanders! These villains didn't come to Earth for the sightseeing…so get ready to blow them to smithereens! Use your wits and skills to overcome the attack balls pouring from the skies and rescue the world’s cities and landmarks from impending annihilation Adventures are best shared. The couch-coop feature is available in every game mode, allowing friends and family to team up and save the world. You can also show off your skills and challenge your worldwide friends to see who got the sharpest skills and can down the most balls. ● Local and Online Co-op Mode ● More than 100 levels ● Great arsenal of weapons you can use! ● Boss fights!
